name: Custom Cloth Doll with Hand Painted Face
description:
Cloth Doll Custom Handpainted Heirloom Doll

Now available: completely customizable Hen And Chick Heirloom Cloth Dolls! Your gorgeous 18 inch tall portrait doll with beautifully expressive hand-painted face will be created for the doll lover in your life to your exact specifications!

Choose from the following for girl dolls and boy dolls:

Hairstyle
Hair Color
Skin tone
Eye Color

Outfit add-on (One included):

felt pea coat
removable skirt
sailor collar
hooded cloak
pants (default for boy dolls, please note pants are not removeable)

Let me know if you have a preferred general color scheme for the clothing.

Also available, freckles and glasses!

I will contact you to verify your selected options with you before I start, so no worries! You can also contact me by selecting "contact" at the top of the page.

Please allow two full weeks before your doll will ship.

These dolls are best for children over age 3 due to the buttons, snaps, and other small embellishments which may pose a choking hazard. Fine for all ages when used as an heirloom shelf ornament.

Each Hen And Chick doll is one of a kind, hand made from my original design out of new and recycled fabrics. There's not another doll in the whole wide world just like this one! Give the gift of a beautiful, one-of-a-kind, heirloom doll to your favorite young person (or young at heart), and watch a life-long friendship develop!

***************
Some feedback from other customers who bought Hen And Chick Heirloom Dolls:

"I have bought several rag dolls before, none were as well-made and pretty as yours. Your price is more than fair. Great customer service and fast. The most amazing detailed clothes ever. I felt I got way more than I paid for! I've been telling all my friends. Thank you!"

"Beautiful craftsmanship. Just stunning work!"

"Even more beautiful in person!"

"Absolutely BEAUTIFUL! Fast shipping, nice crafter. Well made. A+"

"Wonderful! Carefully made, beautiful color combo, fast shipping. So adorable. THANKS."

"Well-crafted, meticulously hand-painted, carefully wrapped. Love her!"

"Thanks for making the little details I asked for. They were custom touches that made these dolls just like their owners."

"I am a huge fan. The doll I ordered was so lovely. Couldn't be happier with my purchase. I highly recommend. Thanks!"

"So perfectly crafted and beautifully sewn! The fabric she chose for me was wonderful - exactly what I envisioned. And the face... the painted eyes are exquisite. What a treasure! "
